name: PSX_DESTRUCTION GAME
description:
Edgy and very cheesy open world game entry for a game jam.

Play in a procedurally generated map.

Take down buildings to score points.

Score points to feed your pride.

CONTROLS :

FIRE - LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

MOVE :

LEFT  - A

RIGHT - D

FORWARD - W

BACKWARD - S

JUMP - SPACE BAR

PREVIEW YOUR SCORE - TAB

PAUSE GAME - ESCAPE KEY
